Blog.post: My friend eric and I found this new program for AIM called Middle_man its only in beta release(phase 2) but its pretty cool, if you want it click urlLink here , this link should start the download automatically. OH! dont forget to add me to ur AIM buddy list. To add me urlLink Click Here

What up this is cody hooks, if u dont know me fuck off... Well i started this blog thing today and i dont know if ill use it very much. Well today sucked my mom wouldnt let me shave me head but im going to anyway... lol, I've sat at home on the computer all day and everyonce in a while i played Socom on PS2, it got boring and it started to piss me off cause i kept dieing... Well im out urlLink email me or urlLink IM me on AIM

So ask out lina today, I was messing with her ex and I was like yea dude im just gonna wax it and he told her that... But she was like is it true and I was like yea I said that but I was just messing around, she was like oh ok good. So she's coming back from florida monday... Im gonna try and go see her... YELLOWCARD is my new favorite band, I love all they're songs... Mostly Only one, Cigarette, and Way away! Well I g2g email me or some shit! peace

What up, not much here just seeing if my blog thing still works cause I went and messed with the setting and fucked it up... Lol im gonna try and hooks up with this girl named lina, lol. Well im bored so peace out!
What up not much here just chillin at jeremys, that mother fucker is over there trippin off codean or something like that... All because he wrecked his 4 wheeler oh well, I wish I was drunk... Lol

What up not much here just chillin being bored... lol, listening to music... Trying to find a new look for my blog because I want one that fits me u know what I mean? Oh, well fuck it... If you've got any suggestions for my blog email me cause this shits boring and im about to stop posting in it so if you look at it email me so I know how many people come here... lol, and do you like this look?

My best friend jeremy almost died today, well not really all he came out with was a broken anckle, and a sprain wrist... So anyway, im glad it didnt happen last weekend when I was with him... So, im bored, If you wanna chat IM me.

What up, not much here just chillin, im bout to go chill with jeremy... lol, and im about to add a new pic. to my profile so tell me what you think of it... If anyone actually reads this thing feel free to leave comments about the post and if you dont like it, I dont give a shit! lol, urlLink Email me ...

What up, I just got home from my dads... Now im bored so im prolly just gonna chill and my room and get on the computer for the rest of the day, lol. Probably not because my mom will make me clean or something, either that or ill go to my bro's. Well anyway im out, urlLink IM me if you want.

What up, I just noticed that every entry in my blog starts out with what up, lol. Oh well its just cause im pimp like that, anyway Kristina Xanga SUCKS. You should join urlLink Blogger lol, seriously I think its better.

I was reading someones Xanga journal or whatever it was and I found out that they have a group of like 25-30 people that go to santa fe, I thought the whole group thing was cool, but I just dont like Xanga... Its all about the blog! urlLink Check out the Santa Fe Group! anyway todays gonna suck, I hope my bro comes and gets me cause if he doesnt im gonna be stuck in the house all day, which is really boring. Im bored so urlLink IM me on aim, Im away but if im here ill prolly come back! well im out, peace!
What up, shit is gay im kinda sick or something I woke up at like 1am and couldnt go back to sleep because I couldnt breath, Anyway im bored, IM me on aim if you want!

What up not much here still chillin, wish i could go party somewhere... Im bored this will be the last time I fuck up, (lol, or get caught) anyway. Im bout to go eat some chicken, if u wanna talk just IM me! or call me... 613-9278

What up, Happy fourth of july... Im sitting at home on my ass doing absolutley nothing, we're supposed to be grilling in a little while so that cool! Straight up clinton style Chicken and beer... lol really! Anyway im out peace!

What up, not much here... shit is gay, im bored again... Im bout to go chill with my brother when he gets off work we'll prolly go drink with some of his friends lol... I was playing socom earlier but that shit got old again cause i kept dieing... urlLink Email me cause im bored as fuck! I prolly wont check it till tom. but atleast ill have something to do tom.
